title: Can the worlds patch please get a hotfix?
body:
Nothing but "ardent censer rush strats" every goddamn game is getting boring as fuck.

I want to see flash crescendos, prediction hooks, 5-man tempered fates, flashy Rakan engages...

It's the juggernaut patch all over again, but it's not as exciting.

replies.body:
I'm not surprised AT ALL

Every worlds since S3, Janna becomes a contested pick. Literally becomes pick or ban. With Ardent being to powerful, it only cemented that she will be a pick/ban champion

Worse, it's a ADC meta so...yeahhhh

Uhhh wut? Other shield champs have seen more priority most seasons at worlds. Lulu, Karma, Orianna, Ivern, especially because unlike a cheese comp they can take roles outside the support slot and be safe draft picks.

See what happened to that patch was... like every other patch and meta...

People cried and complained until nerfs were eventually made... and now we have this where people will continue to cry and complain until ardent/adcs get nerfed.



And after that it will prob be tanks.

It's a SINGLE item that has caused such drastic meta warping.
First botlane to have Ardent online wins lane.
Whichever bot lane wins lane usually wins game.

Supports are running gold quints, and sometimes even 9x gold yellows.
ADC's start Relic Shield to funnel more gold into them.

I wouldn't be surprised if the worlds botlane meta actually moves to letting the support get half or more of the lane cs.
Like, it doesn't matter how far behind your adc is, because you have Censor online first so they instantly win trades.

So? What you said has 0 to do with what i said.

I understand you want to make an argument for argument's sake... but uh, choose the correct one.
I was pointing out that the complaints were well-founded. Unlike most other things people have whined about to get changed.

It Generally only is a Single item that people complain about anymore though.


Deaths Dance, Stoneplate, Ardent, Redemption.


Pretty sure Locket was a complaint at one point also.



...and GA.
Wasn't sona instantly nerfed last time she was pro viable because it means she is blatantly OP

Kind of. She is incredibly predictable an easy to counter. The only fairly unpredictable combo is flash+ulti, outside of it she is too binary. 

Last time she was a real pick in the LCS (and still not really popular) was when she had 58% win rate in solo queue.
The professional meta always stagnates. no exceptions.
